titles.pageTitle: Assert.AreEqual Method (float3, float3, float, string, int, string)
titles.navigationTitle: AreEqual Method (float3, float3, float, string, int, string)
titles.indexTitle: AreEqual(float3, float3, float, string, int, string)
titles.fullyQualifiedIndexTitle: Uno.Testing.Assert.AreEqual(float3, float3, float, string, int, string)

syntax.uno: public static voidAreEqual(float3 expected, float3 actual, float tolerance = 1e-05f, string filePath = """", int lineNumber = 0, string memberName = """") {}

comment.full:
Asserts that `actual` is equal to `expected`

If `tolerance` is given, asserts that each element of `actual` and `expected` do not differ by more than `tolerance`

(Do not use the `filePath`, `lineNumber` and `memberName` arguments, as these are filled in automatically)
